# Best Queer Short Award

Best Queer Short () is an annual film award presented by the Clermont-Ferrand International Short Film Festival, to honor the year's best LGBTQ-themed short film in each year's festival program. The award was created in 2022, as a collaboration between Clermont-Ferrand and the Cannes Film Festival's Queer Palm jury.
